Html:
Hello All, we have an environment where servers are patched using WSUS. They are divided into 2 parts - AUTO RE-START and MANUAL RE-START. We have observed that few servers which are in MANUAL RE-START mode have not been patched since July 23, 2014. Upon getting to the Windows Update page it shows a GREEN TICK MARK stating that the server patches are up-to-date. WSUS has released around 4 patches to be installed on to the servers. All the servers have been patched fine but around 8 - 9 servers which are Windows Server 2008 Enterprise have not been patched during the August 19, 2014 patching. I have the windows update logs from one of the servers given below. I need some help urgently to determine why these servers were not patched during the August patching and the rest of them were patched fine.

And, what is the Relationship with Wsus Package Publisher ?
You should ask your question on Technet Forum
